reviewText:
i owned all 12 of these tapes on VHS, and I've seen about 20 or so GGW movies.  The Unsensored and Beyond is definately the most hardcore with some boy/girl action as well.

I just picked up Behind Closed Doors and that was good too... but if you want to see some boy/girl stuff (alittle bit) then pick up this dvd

There are 12 DVD's in this series.  The eleventh in the series is a bit disappointing.  It shows the expected flashing and total nudity.  Why is this disappointing?  It doesn't go as far as the others.  I'd give it four stars.  The way to think about the others is that the titles really mean something.  In particular, I'm referring to "Beyond."  It is remarkable how far some girls will go in full view of dozens of people.  The most explicit scenes, however, were filmed in doors; in a hotel corridor, an indoor parking lot, elsewhere.  Try one of the eleven (1-10, 12).  I give them five stars.
